Welcome.title: Welcome to Foresight
Welcome.content: With the advent of novel technologies, our approach towards problem-solving is undergoing a paradigm shift, enabling more profound and multifaceted analyses. Our early attempt of NLP-pipeline prototype for GPHIN Next Generation represents an initial foray into leveraging technology for public health surveillance, yet it merely skims the surface of potential applications. Current capabilities extend far beyond, with the capacity to process from seven thousand to millions of articles and billions of data points every day, highlighting the critical need for automation and efficiency enhancement in data processing and analysis.

SidePanel.title: The Side Panel
SidePanel.content: This is the side panel where you can read and interact with clusters and articles.

SearchAndFilter.title: Search and filter functions
SearchAndFilter.content: You can search for certain keywords and specify a date and time span that you are interested in.

KeywordSearch.title: Keyword Search
KeywordSearch.content: For our example, try searching for the term pneumonia, and press enter when finished.

DatePickerIntro.title: Date Picker
DatePickerIntro.content: To select a date, start by clicking on this button.

DatePickerDate.title: Date Picker
DatePickerDate.content: Now choose a date, for this example please select Dec 31st, 2019.

FilterViewIntro.title: Filter View
FilterViewIntro.content: You can see the article count has changed based on our search criteria, however not all health threat categories are currently visible. Lets modify the selected categories by clicking on the Filter View button.

FilterViewSelectThreat.title: Filter View
FilterViewSelectThreat.content: Here you can see all the relevant public health threats that are being detected. We are interested in only a certain few. Please toggle on Unrecognized health risks.

FilterViewClose.title: Filter View
FilterViewClose.content: Once finished toggling health threats, close the dialog using the Filter View button.

ClusterGraph.title: Cluster Graph
ClusterGraph.content:
Here we can see the cluster view update based on our search criteria. In this view we can see the relevant articles and how they relate to each other based on our keyword search, the speicified date and the selected health threats.

We will explore this graph more in later steps.

GraphViews.title: Graph Views
GraphViews.content: You can change how the graph is displayed using different layouts. A map view is also available which will display the clusters on a world map.

CollapseAllIntro.title: Graph Views
CollapseAllIntro.content: These allow you to re-apply the selected layout, expand all articles and collapse all articles.

CollapseAll.title: Graph Views
CollapseAll.content: By default, all articles are expanded. Try collapsing all the articles by clicking on this button.

ArticleClusters.title: Article Clusters
ArticleClusters.content:
On the side menu we can see the clusters sorted by size. For our example we are interested in the Viral Pneumonia Outbreak in Wuhan cluster.

Click on the locate button to bring this cluster into view.

ExpandClusterIntro.title: Cluster
ExpandClusterIntro.content: Double click on the cluster node to expand it's contents.

ExpandCluster.title: Cluster
ExpandCluster.content: The article within this cluster can now be seen in green.

SelectedClusterIntro.title: Selected Cluster
SelectedClusterIntro.content: Here you can see the details about the cluster we have selected. A summary about the cluster and pre-generated questions are provided below.

ChatConsole.title: Chat Console
ChatConsole.content: Here you can ask your own questions to learn more about the cluster. The answers are provided by AI's understanding of the cluster.

EndOfTour.title: End of tour
EndOfTour.content: This concludes our tour! If you would like to replay this tour you may do so through the button here.

WorkingWith.articles: You are working with {count, plural, =1 {one article} other {# articles}}.
WorkingWith.items: Found {count, plural, =1 {one relevant item} other {# relevant items}}.

Graph.expandArticles: Expand {type, select, hierarchicalcluster {articles along path} other {all articles}}
Graph.satelliteToggle: Toggle between satellite and terrain view
Graph.mapView: Toggle between map and graph view

SidePanel.panelTitle: {type, select, cluster {Selected Cluster} article {Selected Article} hierarchicalcluster {Clusters in hierarchy} threat {Clusters related to threat} other {Article Clusters}}
SidePanel.title: Title:

Title.openTitle: {clear, select, true {Articles in this cluster} other {Clear selection}}
